root.name: F1 Online: The Game
root.description: F1 Online is a browser based, free to play game, developed using the Unity engine. Players will be able to create their own teams with custom livery or take control of any of the current constructor teams and manage them through a season.F1 online was closed on Tuesday May 7th 2013.Official URL: http://www.f1onlinethegame.com/
